div.p: ONLINE USER 1: So the basic formula for alcoholism is the same as heart disease, right?
ONLINE USER 2: Yep. It's biology plus choice equals outcome. It's the same for any lifestyle-related health problem.
ONLINE USER 3: Can't control my body... I mean, my biology.
ONLINE USER 4: Right, I can't control my biology, but I can control my choices.
